interpretation: The "computer mouse" card represents control and navigation. This card is about utilizing technology to get what you want. It suggests that you have the tools and resources at your fingertips to achieve your goals, and you should take advantage of them. This card can also indicate a need to be precise and methodical in your approach. You may need to click through multiple options to find the right path, but trust that you have the ability to find your way. In relationships, this card suggests a need for clear communication and a willingness to navigate through any obstacles. Overall, the "computer mouse" card reminds you that you have the power to navigate your own destiny.
